name: Roadside
description:
Submission to Weekly Game Jam #36 Theme: Twins

The twins were in the middle of nowhere.

The crash left one of the twins' legs seriously injured. He couldn't walk.

Dark figures emerged from the woods...

They were not there to help.

Play as both twins and survive the attack of these unearthly creatures.

Controls:

Melee Twin

  • W,A,S,D to move
  • Aim with Mouse
  • Left Mouse Button to attack
  • Tab to switch twin

Torch Twin

  • Aim with Mouse
  • Tab to switch twin
Authors:

Artworks by SomeFarang

Code by dasPanjo and jvolonte

Main Theme by Benjo  | Benjo's Soundcloud

SFX  from: ZapSplat
